alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 31 at 1:47PM MST until January 02 at 6:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. Wind gusts up to 75 mph possible along Rocky Mountain Front. * WHERE...The Rocky Mountain Front, including all of Glacier County. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause isolated power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing and drifting of snow may significantly reduce visibility at times and cause partial lane blockages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing and drifting of snow may significantly reduce visibility at times and cause partial lane blockages.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
